Real CatalogedStar::getAbsoluteMagnitude (   ) 
 

Vector3 CatalogedStar::getPosition (   ) 
 

This getPosition() method returns the approximate star position; that is, star position without any orbital motion taken into account. For a star in an orbit, the position should be set to the 'root' barycenter of the system.
